data.title: Religious Views of President John F. Kennedy in His Own Words by Schneider, Nicholas A.: Fine Hardcover (1965) First Edition
data.meta_description: First Edition - Hardcover - B. Herder Book Company, St. Louis - 1965 - Condition: Fine - Fine Slipcase - Religion, history, politics. Book and slipcase fine and clean, inside and out. - Religious Views of President John F. Kennedy in His Own Words
data.text:
Terms of Sale:

We guarantee the condition of every book as it's described on the Abebooks web sites. If you're dissatisfied with your purchase (Incorrect Book/Not as Described/Damaged) or if the order hasn't arrived, you're eligible for a refund within 30 days of the estimated delivery date. If you've changed your mind about a book that you've ordered, please use the Ask bookseller a question link to contact us and we'll respond within 2 business days. You must contact us before returning any merchandise. New ...

More Information

Shipping Terms:

Orders usually ship within 2 business days. Shipping costs are based on books weighing 2.2 LB, or 1 KG mailed USPS Media Mail. If your book order is heavy or oversized, we may contact you to let you know extra shipping is required.

International shipping charges are based on a book that will fit into a USPS flat-rate envelope. We will still refund for damaged or incorrect books, but only if it is returned to us.

If you would like a quicker more secure shipping method, please contact us prior to placing your order, and we will quote the cost.
